meanings.definition: The way in which something is arranged or organized.
meanings.sent1: The layout of the store made it easy to find everything.
meanings.sent2: She carefully planned the layout of her bedroom before moving in.
meanings.sent3: The layout of the picnic blankets resembled a colorful mosaic.
meanings.sent4: The layout of the city streets was like a complex puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The layout of the garden was so beautiful, it felt like walking through a painting.

meanings.definition: A plan or design of something, such as a room or building.
meanings.sent1: The architect presented the layout of the new office building.
meanings.sent2: I sketched out a rough layout of the furniture arrangement in the living room.
meanings.sent3: The layout of the board game was so confusing, we kept getting lost.
meanings.sent4: The layout of the maze was designed to confuse and challenge the participants.
meanings.sent5: The layout of the playground was so creative, it inspired children to play for hours.

meanings.definition: The process of arranging text and images on a page.
meanings.sent1: She spent hours perfecting the layout of the magazine spread.
meanings.sent2: The graphic designer focused on creating an appealing layout for the website.
meanings.sent3: The layout of the menu was so artistic, it felt like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The layout of the brochure was strategically designed to attract customers.
meanings.sent5: The layout of the book was so well-done, it enhanced the reading experience.
